introduce.title: Introduce
introduce.quote: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen
introduce.ml-projects: ML projects scaled using MLOps standards

about.title: About
about.quote1: MLOps Engineer with a solid background in cloud environments (primarily Azure) and previous experience as a data engineer. Specialized in automating training and deployment pipelines, infrastructure as code, and DevOps practices applied to the ML lifecycle
about.quote2: I consider myself a proactive individual with a strong ability to learn, who enjoys collaborating with multidisciplinary and multicultural teams
